statements: SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT address, city, state, zip_code FROM emergency_contacts WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE zip_code = '90210';
SELECT id, name, phone_number, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY id DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, phone_number, email, address FROM emergency_contacts WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY zip_code LIMIT 10
SELECT id, name, email, city FROM emergency_contacts WHERE state = 'Texas' AND zip_code LIKE '7%' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE state = 'Florida' AND city = 'Miami' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM emergency_contacts WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY city, state DESC
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT name, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT contact_id, name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY contact_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT ec.name, ld.longitude, ld.latitude FROM emergency_contacts ec JOIN location_data ld ON ec.contact_id = ld.emergency_contact_id;
SELECT ec.name, ec.email, ld.latitude, ld.longitude FROM emergency_contacts ec JOIN location_data ld ON ec.contact_id = ld.emergency_contact_id WHERE ld.latitude > 30 AND ld.longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT full_name, email FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT contact_id, full_name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_description, incident_time FROM incidents WHERE incident_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT location_name, full_name, phone_number FROM location_data ld JOIN incidents i ON ld.location_id = i.location_id JOIN emergency_contacts ec ON i.contact_id = ec.contact_id;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT name, phone_number, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT incident_id, description, timestamp FROM incidents ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT response_id, responder_name, response_time FROM incident_responses WHERE responder_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT name, phone_number, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT incident_id, description, timestamp FROM incidents ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT response_id, responder_name, response_time FROM incident_responses WHERE incident_id = 1 ORDER BY response_time ASC;
SELECT ec.name, ec.phone_number, l.street_address, l.city FROM emergency_contacts ec INNER JOIN locations l ON ec.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT description FROM incidents WHERE incident_id = 1001;
SELECT name, expertise FROM responders WHERE expertise = 'Medical';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM location_data ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC;
SELECT incidents.description, responders.name FROM incidents JOIN responders ON incidents.incident_id = responders.responder_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM incidents;
